publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3105 Michael Matheson: Congratulations to St Andrews—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal and Ancient Golf Club of St Andrews for its running of the 134th Open Championship; congratulates Tiger Woods and Scotland’s Colin Montgomerie for achieving first and second place respectively and Lloyd Saltman, the leading amateur, and looks forward to the Open Championship returning to Scotland in 2007 at Carnoustie. Supported by: Mr Ted Brocklebank*
S2M-3105 Congratulations to St Andrews (lodged on 18 July 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3105 Congratulations to St Andrews (lodged on 18 July 2005) Ms Sandra White*, Iain Smith*
S2M-3105 Congratulations to St Andrews (lodged on 18 July 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3105 Congratulations to St Andrews (lodged on 18 July 2005) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-3105 Congratulations to St Andrews (lodged on 18 July 2005) Donald Gorrie*
